resources.string: Please note that the settings is directly proportional to the key points and the material you would be shown. The settings can be changed at any time. Happy Reading!

Programming languages Key Points is an application implemented on Android Platform. This application is a final year project carried out by Adebanjo Ridwan Ayodeji of matric number 14/69/0016 under the supervision of the department Mr Biodun Orunsolu.
